trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
This constructor initializes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property using the `columnIndex` value.
The values of properties inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs> are initialized to the values specified in `e`.
The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"></xref> containing the inherited event data.
The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.

This method indicates the column to the left of the double-clicked divider if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>; otherwise, it indicates the column to the right of the double-clicked divider.
The index is the zero-based index of the column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
The index of the column next to the divider.
